Export.Routine:
WWWMON ;WWWMON;DT;MONATSABSCHLUSS;09.11.1999 ; Compiled January 17, 2005 16:44:24 #include COMSYS #include WWWConst /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; Description of Function : ; MONATSABSCHLUSS ; MONTH-END CLOSING ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 07-Dec-2007 GRF Doco; quits; parentheses missing around date check!!! ; 09-Sep-2005 JW SR12966: Disabled WWWUSER block. ; 05-Sep-2005 RPW SR13410: The second loop through WWWUSER should use the ; first subscript, not the second. ; 02-Sep-2005 JW SR12966: WWWUSER is shared. ; WWWBENCH/WWWLAST/WWW1205B/WWW1205/WWWPRO are not shared. ; 07-Jul-2005 shobby SR12892: WWW1262 is no longer shared. ; 07-Jul-2005 shobby SR12892: WWW126 is no longer shared. ; 05-Apr-2005 SCR SR12040 Disabled Re-Index , Now part of COMClassCompile ; 27.09.2004 BEC 26420 ; 09.11.1999 DT ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ IF +$GET(VORG(1))=0 DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32017)) QUIT ;NICHT STARTEN ;Not launching DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32018)) ;GESTARTET ;D START W "OK" Q ;JOB START^WWWMON::1 ;JOB STARTEN JOB START1^WWWMON($GET(YM),$GET(SPRACHE))::1 ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 QUIT
START ;!EINSPRUNG VON AUSSEN (WWWIN) ;SET $ZTRAP="^WWWERROR" ;DO LOW^%PRIO ;DO ^WWWVAR DO START1($GET(YM),$GET(SPRACHE)) ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 QUIT
START1(YM,SPRACHE) ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 SET $ZTRAP="^WWWERROR" DO LOW^%PRIO DO ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 . NEW YM,SPRACHE . DO ^WWWVAR ;VARIABLEN LADEN ;charge
; "Job Started : DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM:SS" ;--------------------------------------- SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,"WWWMON",1),Y,110)=$$^WWWTEXT(32028)_": "_$$^WWWDATE($HOROLOG)_", "_$$^WWWTIME($HOROLOG) ;AUFBEREITUNG GESTARTET
; Combine System and Application Parameters (Authorisation) ; and save as Application only ;--------------------------------------- IF $DATA(^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG")) DO ;UMKOPIEREN DER WWW100 BERECHTIGUNG ;the . NEW YI,YII . ; . ;DANN ZURÜCK IN DIE NEUE DATEI ;back within who data file . ;-------------------------------------------------------- . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . SET YII="" . . FOR SET YII=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII)) QUIT:YII="" DO . . . SET ^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)=$GET(^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)) . ; . NEW YI,YII . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . SET YII="" . . FOR SET YII=$ORDER(^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII)) QUIT:YII="" DO . . . SET ^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)=$GET(^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)) . ; . KILL ^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG") ;LÖSCHEN ALTE FILE ;Delete
IF '$DATA(^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG")) DO ;UMKOPIEREN BACKUP . NEW YI,YII . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW100(0,"XBERECHTIGUNG",YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . SET YII="" . . FOR SET YII=$ORDER(^WWW100(0,"XBERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII)) QUIT:YII="" DO . . . SET ^WWW101(0,"BERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)=$GET(^WWW100(0,"XBERECHTIGUNG",YI,YII,1)) . ; . KILL ^WWW100(0,"BERECHTIGUNG") ;LÖSCHEN ALTE FILE ;Delete
DO MONATE ;GENERIEREN MONATSVORGABEN DO WOCHEN ;GENERIEREN WOCHENVORGABEN DO BERECHTIGUNG ;SETZEN BERECHTIGUNGEN BEC;25.11.03 DA KEINE BERECHTIGUNG IN GMBH ;typeset yonder no within DO PROTOKOLL ;RÜCKSETZEN PROTOKOLL ;protocol
;ZWISCHENDATEIEN LÖSCHEN ;Delete Buffer Files DO ;AKTUELLE USER . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF ($PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YA,1)),Y,3)+1)<$HOROLOG KILL ^WWWUSER(0,YA) KILL ^WWWUSER1(0,YA) ;FIS;06.05.04;NEU:WWWUSER1
/* SR12966: Advised by FIS to disable code. DO ;AKTUELLE USER . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWUSER(YA)) QUIT:YA="" IF '$DATA(^WWW012(0,YA)) KILL ^WWWUSER(YA) KILL ^WWWUSER1(0,YA) ;FIS;06.05.04;NEU:WWWUSER1 ; SR13410
DO ;AKTUELLE USER . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF ($PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YA,1)),Y,3)+1)<$HOROLOG KILL ^WWWUSER(0,YA) KILL ^WWWUSER1(0,YA) ;FIS;06.05.04;NEU:WWWUSER1 */
DO ;AKTUELLE USERFILE . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWUSE(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) . . KILL ^WWWUSE(0,YA)
DO ;TEMP FILE ;FIS;25.06.04;25998 . KILL ^WWWUSETMP(0)
DO ;AKTUELLE USERFILE XML MESSAGES . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWXML(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWXML(0,YA)) ; FIXME : <GRF> Should this be ^WWWUSER or remove? . . KILL ^WWWXML(0,YA)
DO ;AKTUELLE SEITENFILE . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWPAGE(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) . . KILL ^WWWPAGE(0,YA)
DO ;AKTUELLE ZWISCHENDATEI . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:YA'<$HOROLOG . . KILL ^WWWZWS(0,YA)
DO ;AKTUELLE USER ZWISCHENDATEI . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) . . QUIT:+YA=0 . . KILL ^WWWSOR(YA)
DO ;AKTUELLE ZWISCHENDATEI . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWDATEN(YM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . QUIT:YA'<$HOROLOG . . KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,YA)
DO ;AKTUELLE ZWISCHENDATEI WELCHE DATEN WURDEN ANGEFRAGT ;who were . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWW126(YM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . SET YA(1)="" . . FOR SET YA(1)=$ORDER(^WWW126(YM,YA,YA(1))) QUIT:YA(1)="" DO . . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWW013(0,YA(1))) ;MITARBEITERDATEN . . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWUSER(0,YA(1))) . . . KILL ^WWW126(YM,YA,YA(1)) . . . KILL ^WWW1262(YM,YA,YA(1))
DO ;AKTUELLE ZWISCHENDATEI LETZTEN 10 EINHEITEN . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWW1262(YM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . SET YA(1)="" . . FOR SET YA(1)=$ORDER(^WWW1262(YM,YA,YA(1))) QUIT:YA(1)="" DO . . . IF '$DATA(^WWW126(YM,YA,YA(1))) KILL ^WWW1262(YM,YA,YA(1)) . . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWW013(0,YA(1))) ;MITARBEITERDATEN . . . KILL ^WWW1262(YM,YA,YA(1)) . . . KILL ^WWW126(YM,YA,YA(1))
KILL ^WWWPARAEXPL ;FIS;23441;02.06.03;LÖSCHEN ZWISCHENDATEI SUCHANZEIGE
DO ;LÖSCHEN PROTOKOLL HINTERGRUNDJOBS ;Delete protocol . NEW YA,DATE . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^INBACKJOBS1(YM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . SET DATE="" . . FOR SET DATE=$ORDER(^INBACKJOBS1(YM,YA,DATE)) QUIT:DATE="" DO . . . IF DATE<($HOROLOG-30) KILL ^INBACKJOBS1(YM,YA,DATE) ; 07-Dec-2007 GRF
DO ;AKTUELLE ZWISCHENDATEI ÄLTER 1 MONAT ;month . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWBENCH(YM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF YA<($HOROLOG-31) KILL ^WWWBENCH(YM,YA)
DO ;FOOL DATEI 1 JAHR;TYBD;16,12,2003 . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWFOOL(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF YA<($HOROLOG-365) KILL ^WWWFOOL(0,YA)
DO ;LOGIN DATEI 1 JAHR;TYBD;16,12,2003 . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWLOGIN(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF YA<($HOROLOG-365) KILL ^WWWLOGIN(0,YA)
DO ;ZWISCHENDATEI WWWRELOAD LÖSCHEN ;Delete . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWRELOAD(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF YA'=+$HOROLOG KILL ^WWWRELOAD(0,YA)
DO ;DATEI WWW013M ÄLTER 1 MONAT LÖSCHEN ;data file month Delete . SET YN="" . FOR SET YN=$ORDER(^WWW013M(0,YN)) QUIT:YN="" DO . . SET YNN="" . . FOR SET YNN=$ORDER(^WWW013M(0,YN,YNN)) QUIT:YNN="" DO . . . SET YA=+$PIECE($GET(^WWW013M(0,YN,YNN,1)),Y,2) . . . IF YA'=0 IF YA<($HOROLOG-31) DO ^WWWSKILL("WWW013M",YN_","_YNN)
DO . NEW FORM,DATE,MIT . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWW1205B(YM,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . SET MIT="" . . FOR SET MIT=$ORDER(^WWW1205B(YM,FORM,MIT)) QUIT:MIT="" DO . . . IF '$DATA(^WWW013(0,MIT)) KILL ^WWW1205B(YM,FORM,MIT) ;LÖSCHEN WENN MITARBEITER NICHT MEHR EXISTIERT ;Delete when Not more
DO . NEW FORM,YA . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWW1205(YM,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . SET YA="" . . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWW1205(YM,FORM,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . . IF YA<($HOROLOG-365) KILL ^WWW1205(YM,FORM,YA) ;LÖSCHEN ALTE DATEN ;Delete
DO ;LÖSCHEN LETZTE ÄNDERUNGEN ;Delete last . NEW TAGE,LOEDAT,KEY . SET TAGE=357 . SET LOEDAT=$HOROLOG-TAGE . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWWLAST(YM,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO ;Letzte änderung . . SET KEY="" . . FOR SET KEY=$ORDER(^WWWLAST(YM,FORM,KEY)) QUIT:KEY="" DO ;Letzte änderung . . . SET DAT="" . . . FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^WWWLAST(YM,FORM,KEY,DAT)) QUIT:DAT="" QUIT:DAT>LOEDAT DO . . . . KILL ^WWWLAST(YM,FORM,KEY,DAT)
DO ^WWW009 ;STARTEN GRUPPENBEZEICHNUNG (::TEXT) ÜBESETZTEN ;launching
; vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ;ÜBERSETZUNG BERICHTIGEN; ;version regulate ;IF '$DATA(^WWWDIC(0,"DE","EN")) DO . NEW TEXT,TEXT1,TEXTV . MERGE ^XWWWDIC=^WWWDIC . KILL ^WWWDIC . SET TEXT="" . FOR SET TEXT=$ORDER(^XWWWDIC(0,TEXT)) QUIT:TEXT="" DO . . SET TEXTV=TEXT . . FOR QUIT:$EXTRACT($REVERSE(TEXTV))'=" " SET TEXTV=$EXTRACT(TEXTV,1,$LENGTH(TEXTV)-1) . . QUIT:+TEXTV'=0 . . SET TEXTV=$TRANSLATE(TEXTV,""""_"#!*") . . QUIT:TEXTV="" . . SET TEXT1=$GET(^XWWWDIC(0,TEXT,1)) . . FOR QUIT:$EXTRACT($REVERSE(TEXT1))'=" " SET TEXT1=$EXTRACT(TEXT1,1,$LENGTH(TEXT1)-1) . . SET TEXT1=$TRANSLATE(TEXT1,""""_"#!*") . . QUIT:TEXT1="" . . SET ^WWWDIC(0,"DE","EN",TEXTV,1)=TEXT1 . . SET ^WWWDIC(0,"EN","DE",TEXT1,1)=TEXTV . ; . KILL ^XWWWDIC ; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END
/* ;AUTOMATISCHE SORTKEY GENERIERTUNG ; ; 05-Apr-2005 SCR SR12040 Disabled Re-Index , Now part of COMClassCompile ; ;SET SORT="" ;FOR SET SORT=$ORDER(^WWWSORTKEY(0,SORT)) QUIT:SORT="" DO ;. NEW NEWINDEX ;. QUIT:$PIECE($GET(^WWWSORTKEY(0,SORT,1)),Y,1)'="" ;SCHON GELAUFEN ;yet ;. SET NEWINDEX=$PIECE($GET(^WWWSORTKEY(0,SORT,1)),Y,3) ;NUR BESTIMMTE INDEX ;only index ;. SET VORG(1)=SORT ;. DO ;. . NEW SORT ;. . SET YQ=1 ;. . SET VORG1=VORG(1) ;. . DO NEW^WWWSORT(VORG1,NEWINDEX) ;. ; ;. IF $$^WWWUPER($PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,94))="DEVELOPMENT" QUIT ;NICHT BEI ENTWICKLUNG ;Not next to development ;. SET $PIECE(^WWWSORTKEY(0,SORT,1),Y,1)=$HOROLOG */
; "Last Preparation : DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM:SS" ;--------------------------------------- SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,"WWWMON",1),Y,110)=$$^WWWTEXT(32471)_": "_$$^WWWDATE($HOROLOG)_", "_$$^WWWTIME($HOROLOG) ;LETZE AUFBEREITUNG QUIT
PROTOKOLL ;LÖSCHEN PROTOKOLLDATEI ;WIRD AUCH IN INTAGES GEPRÜFT ;Delete too within ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 05-Feb-2008 shobby SRBR014891: Separated processing from parameter collection ; to aid in moving the 'date' calculation from ; INVORG to WWW012 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do RemoveProtocol($$ModificationLogRetention^WWW012(YM)) ;NEW FORM,DAT,LOEDAT
;SET TAGE=+$PIECE($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)),Y,14) ;IF TAGE'=0 QUIT ;ABERBEITUNG ERFOLGT DURCH INTAGES ;trans- ;SET TAGE=357 ;SET LOEDAT=$HOROLOG-TAGE ;SET FORM="" ;FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWWPRO(YM,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO ;ÄNDERUNGSPROTOKOLL ;. SET DAT="" ;. FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^WWWPRO(YM,FORM,DAT)) QUIT:DAT="" QUIT:DAT>LOEDAT DO ;. . KILL ^WWWPRO(YM,FORM,DAT)
QUIT
RemoveProtocol(pintDays="",pstrPrefix="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Removes logging profiles (WWWPRO : Change Log) for the specified class and ; number of days in the past. ; ; Inputs: ; pintDays: Number of days back to start deleting ; pstrPrefix: Prefix of the class to be removed ; Can specify a module prefix "WWW", or an individual class ; "WWW124". If left blank processes for all classes ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 23-Mar-2009 shobby SRBR014891: Renamed idForm to idClass ; 06-Jun-2008 GRF SRBR014891: calculate length of prefix and loop end ; date once to improve performance ; 05-Feb-2008 shobby SRBR014891: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dteKeep,idClass,intDate,intLength
set intLength = $length(pstrPrefix) ; SRBR014891 set dteKeep = $horolog-pintDays ; SRBR014891
if pintDays'="" { set idClass="" for { set idClass=$order(^WWWPRO(YM,idClass)) quit:idClass=""
if (pstrPrefix="") || ($extract(idClass,1,intLength)=pstrPrefix) { ; SRBR014891 set intDate="" for { set intDate=$order(^WWWPRO(YM,idClass,intDate)) quit:intDate="" quit:intDate>dteKeep ; SRBR014891
kill ^WWWPRO(YM,idClass,intDate) } } } } quit
MONATE ;MONATSPARAMETER NEW SPRACH
FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" FOR WW=$$^WWWYEAR():1:($$^WWWYEAR()+10) DO . KILL ^WWW101(0,"JAHR",SPRACH,WW)
FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" FOR WW=$$^WWWYEAR():1:($$^WWWYEAR()+10) DO . SET ^WWW101(0,"JAHR",SPRACH,WW,1)=WW
SET VON=$$^WWWYEAR($HOROLOG)-1 ;VORJAHR SET BIS=VON+2 FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" FOR WW=VON:1:BIS DO . FOR MONAT=1:1:12 DO . . SET TEXT=$PIECE($$^WWWTEXT(30023,,1,SPRACH),",",MONAT) ;JANUAR,FEBRUAR,... . . SET ^WWW101(0,"MONATE",SPRACH,WW_"-"_$EXTRACT(MONAT+100,2,3),1)=TEXT_" "_WW . ; . FOR QUARTER=1:1:4 DO ;FIS;QUARTAL;11.01.05;26433 . . SET TEXT=$PIECE($$^WWWTEXT(34107,,1,SPRACH),",",QUARTER) ;1.QUARTAL, 2.QUARTAL,... . . SET ^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,WW_"-"_QUARTER,1)=TEXT_" "_WW
;ALTE WERTE LÖSCHEN ;Delete FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" FOR WW=VON:1:BIS DO . FOR MONAT=13:1:100 DO . . KILL ^WWW101(0,"MONATE",SPRACH,WW_"-"_$EXTRACT(MONAT+100,2,3),1) . ; . FOR QUARTER=5:1:50 DO ;FIS;QUARTAL;11.01.05;26433 . . KILL ^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,WW_"-"_QUARTER,1)
;VON = VORJAHR FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" FOR WW=(VON-1):-1:(VON-10) DO . FOR MONAT=1:1:100 DO . . KILL ^WWW101(0,"MONATE",SPRACH,WW_"-"_$EXTRACT(MONAT+100,2,3),1) . ; . FOR QUARTER=1:1:50 DO ;FIS;QUARTAL;11.01.05;26433 . . KILL ^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,WW_"-"_QUARTER,1)
;LÖSCHEN FALSCHE WERTE ;Delete FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" SET VON="" FOR SET VON=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,"MONATE",SPRACH,VON)) QUIT:VON="" DO . IF $LENGTH(+VON)'=4 DO . . KILL ^WWW101(0,"MONATE",SPRACH,VON)
FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" SET VON="" FOR SET VON=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,VON)) QUIT:VON="" DO ;FIS;QUARTAL;11.01.05;26433 . IF $LENGTH(+VON)'=4 KILL ^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,VON) . IF ($PIECE(VON,"-",2)<1)!($PIECE(VON,"-",2)>4) KILL ^WWW101(0,"QUARTER",SPRACH,VON)
QUIT
WOCHEN ;WOCHENPARAMETER NEW SPRACH
SET VON=+$HOROLOG-40 ;VORJAHR SET BIS=VON+365 FOR SPRACH="DE","EN" FOR WW=VON:1:BIS DO . QUIT:$$^WWWDAY(WW)'=1 . SET WOCHE=$$^WWWWEEK(WW) . SET ^WWW101(0,"WOCHEN",SPRACH,$EXTRACT(WOCHE,3,6)_"-"_$EXTRACT(WOCHE,1,2),1)=$EXTRACT(WOCHE,1,2)_". "_$$^WWWTEXT(31001,,,SPRACH)_" "_$EXTRACT(WOCHE,3,6)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(31002,,,SPRACH)_" "_$$^WWWDATE(WW,SPRACH)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(31003,,,SPRACH)_" "_$$^WWWDATE(WW+4,SPRACH)
;ALTE WERTE LÖSCHEN ;Delete SET WEEK=$$^WWWWEEK($HOROLOG-60) FOR SPRACH="DE","EN","FR","PT" SET WEEK1="" FOR SET WEEK1=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,"WOCHEN",SPRACH,WEEK1)) QUIT:WEEK1="" QUIT:WEEK1]($EXTRACT(WEEK,3,6)_"-"_$EXTRACT(WEEK,1,2)) DO . KILL ^WWW101(0,"WOCHEN",SPRACH,WEEK1)
QUIT
BERECHTIGUNG ;SEZTEN BERECHTIGUNGEN IN MENU UND FORMULARE !!EINSPRUNG VON AUSSEN ;within And ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Does processing to add program entitlements. ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 14-Jun-2011 Shobby SR17792: Use Button index for improved performance ; 10-Apr-2007 HeberB BR014350: prevent GenerateCustomButtons being called more than once ; 04-Aug-2006 FIS SR14630: Added CacheTempButtonAccess to limit visibilty of buttons. ; 20-Jan-2006 SteveS SR13171: Commented -- add custom buttons ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;1. MEUE MENUESTRUKTUR PRÜFEN ;check menu ;2. MENUE BERICHTIGEN ;regulate ;3. FORMULARE DEN MENUES ANPASSEN ;take one´s measure for ;4. BUTTONS DEN FORMULAREND ANPASSEN ;take one´s measure for QUIT:$ORDER(^WWW0044(0,""))="" ;KEINE DATEN WEGEN MENUES FITCOM FALSCH IN ENTWICKLUNG;TYBD;29,5,2004;SIEHE INSERV174
DO LOESCH ;LÖSCHEN BERECHTIGUNGEN ;Delete
IF $DATA(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0)) DO ; MENUEUMSTRUKTURIERUNG;26370;TYBD;8,9,2004 . NEW MENU,MENU1,MENUNEW,MENUNEW1,VERSION,APL . ; . SET APL="" . FOR SET APL=$ORDER(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL)) QUIT:APL="" DO . . SET VERSION=$PIECE($GET(^WWWVERSION1(0,APL,1)),Y,2)-1 . . IF VERSION>10000 FOR SET VERSION=$ORDER(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL,VERSION)) QUIT:VERSION="" DO . . . SET MENU="" . . . FOR SET MENU=$ORDER(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL,VERSION,MENU)) QUIT:MENU="" DO . . . . QUIT:$PIECE($GET(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL,VERSION,MENU,1)),Y,2)'="" ;TRANSFER DONE . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL,VERSION,MENU,1),Y,2)=+$HOROLOG ;UMGESETZT . . . . SET MENUNEW=$PIECE($GET(^WWWMENUCHANGE(0,APL,VERSION,MENU,1)),Y,1) ;NEW . . . . SET MENU1=MENU SET MENUNEW1=MENUNEW . . . . DO FOR SET MENU1=$ORDER(^WWW00441(0,APL,MENU1)) QUIT:MENU1="" QUIT:$EXTRACT(MENU1,1,$LENGTH(MENU))'=MENU DO . . . . . SET MENUNEW1=MENUNEW_$PIECE(MENU1,MENU,2,99) . . . . . MERGE ^WWW00441(0,APL,MENUNEW1)=^WWW00441(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . KILL ^WWW00441(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . MERGE ^WWW00442(0,APL,MENUNEW1)=^WWW00442(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . KILL ^WWW00442(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . MERGE ^WWW00443(0,APL,MENUNEW1)=^WWW00443(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . KILL ^WWW00443(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . MERGE ^WWW00444(0,APL,MENUNEW1)=^WWW00444(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . KILL ^WWW00444(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . MERGE ^WWW00445(0,APL,MENUNEW1)=^WWW00445(0,APL,MENU1) . . . . . KILL ^WWW00445(0,APL,MENU1) . ; . DO NEW^WWWSORT("WWW00441") . DO NEW^WWWSORT("WWW00442") . DO NEW^WWWSORT("WWW00443") . DO NEW^WWWSORT("WWW00444") . DO NEW^WWWSORT("WWW00445")
NEW PGM,MENU,MENUP,FORM,FORMB,BER,MOD,BUTT,BUTT1,LANG,MOD1,MENU1,EINB,YQ,MOD1,SEITT,SEITT1
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; ; WWW004: Menu Class ; ; D2 : Form Name ; D3 : User Access ; D4 : Module ; ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
SET EINB=$PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,93) ;EINGESCHRÄNKTE MODULBERECHTIGUNG IF $TRANSLATE(EINB," ;,")="" SET EINB="" SET PGM="" FOR SET PGM=$ORDER(^WWW0044(0,PGM)) QUIT:PGM="" DO . SET YQ=0 . QUIT:PGM="@net_Manager" . SET PGM(1)=$GET(^WWW0044(0,PGM,1)) . IF '$DATA(^WWW004(0,PGM)) KILL ^WWW0044(0,PGM),^WWW00441(0,PGM) QUIT ;KEIN EINTRAG VORHANDEN ;no on hand . SET BER=$PIECE(PGM(1),Y,3) . SET MOD=$PIECE(PGM(1),Y,4) . SET MENU="" . FOR SET MENU=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU)) QUIT:MENU="" DO . . ;BERECHTIGUNG MANDANT ;Company . . SET YQ=0 . . IF EINB'="" DO . . . SET MOD1=$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,4) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . . QUIT:MOD1="" . . . SET YQ=1 . . . FOR YQ(1)=1:1 SET YQ(2)=$PIECE($TRANSLATE(MOD1,",",";"),";",YQ(1)) QUIT:YQ(2)="" DO QUIT:YQ=0 . . . . IF $FIND(";"_EINB_";",";"_YQ(2)_";") SET YQ=0 ;BERECHTIGT . . ; . . QUIT:YQ=1 . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,3)=BER ;BERECHTIGUNG . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,4)=MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . ; . SET MENUP="" . FOR SET MENUP=$ORDER(^WWW00441(0,PGM,MENUP)) QUIT:MENUP="" DO ;SUCHEN UNTERMENUEPUNKTE ;seek . . SET MENUP(1)=$GET(^WWW00441(0,PGM,MENUP,1)) . . QUIT:'$DATA(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1)) ;MENU NICHT VORHANDEN ;Not on hand . . SET MENU1(1)=^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1) ;MENU . . SET BER=$PIECE(MENUP(1),Y,3) . . SET MOD=$PIECE(MENUP(1),Y,4) . . ;BERECHTIGUNG MANDANT ;Company . . SET YQ=0 . . IF EINB'="" DO . . . SET MOD1=$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1),Y,4) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . . QUIT:MOD1="" . . . SET YQ=1 . . . FOR YQ(1)=1:1 SET YQ(2)=$PIECE($TRANSLATE(MOD1,",",";"),";",YQ(1)) QUIT:YQ(2)="" DO QUIT:YQ=0 . . . . IF $FIND(";"_EINB_";",";"_YQ(2)_";") SET YQ=0 ;BERECHTIGT . . ; . . QUIT:YQ=1 . . ; . . IF $PIECE(MENU1(1),Y,2)'="" DO QUIT ;GENAUES PROGRAMM ;programme . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1),Y,3)=BER ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1),Y,4)=MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . ; . . IF $PIECE(MENU1(1),Y,12)'="" DO QUIT ;VERKNÜPFUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1),Y,3)=BER ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENUP,1),Y,4)=MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . ; . . SET MENU1=MENUP FOR SET MENU1=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU1)) QUIT:MENU1="" QUIT:$EXTRACT(MENU1,1,$LENGTH(MENUP))'=MENUP DO . . . QUIT:$EXTRACT(MENU1,1,$LENGTH(MENUP))'=MENUP ;NICHT IN DER GRUPPE ;Not within the group . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU1,1),Y,3)=BER ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU1,1),Y,4)=MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
;PRUEFEN Formulare QUIT:$ORDER(^WWW0044(0,""))="" ;KEINE DATEN WEGEN MENUES FITCOM FALSCH IN ENTWICKLUNG;TYBD;29,5,2004;SIEHE INSERV174
KILL ^CacheTempButtonAccess(YUSER) ;FIS;SR14630;04.08.2006
/***************************** * * FIXME: This routine seems particularly ineffecient. Goes through every form for every form. O(N^N) * *****************************/ ; BR014350 NEW TEMP
SET PGM = "" FOR SET PGM = $ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM)) QUIT:PGM="" DO . QUIT:PGM="@net_Manager" . ; . SET MENU = "" . FOR SET MENU = $ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU)) QUIT:MENU="" DO . . SET MENU(1) = $GET(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1)) . . SET FORM = $PIECE(MENU(1),Y,2) . . SET BER = $PIECE(MENU(1),Y,3) . . SET MOD = $PIECE(MENU(1),Y,4) . . SET MOD1 = $PIECE($GET(^WWW00441(0,PGM,MENU,1)),Y,104) ; $$$WWW00441FromItReadOnly() . . ; . . IF FORM'="" DO ;GENAUES PROGRAMM ;programme . . . QUIT:'$DATA(^WWW120(0,FORM,1)) . . . ; BR014350 . . . ; do GenerateCustomButtons^WWW124Custom(FORM) ;SR13171 . . . IF '$DATA(TEMP(FORM)) DO . . . . do GenerateCustomButtons^WWW124Custom(FORM) ;SR13171 . . . . SET TEMP(FORM)=1 . . . ; . . . NEW YZWB . . . ; . . . SET YZWB=$PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,22) ; D22 $$$WWW120UserAccess() . . . FOR YZWB(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(BER,";",YZWB(1))="" IF '$FIND(";"_YZWB_";",";"_$PIECE(BER,";",YZWB(1))_";") SET YZWB=YZWB_";"_$PIECE(BER,";",YZWB(1)) . . . IF $EXTRACT(YZWB)=";" SET YZWB=$EXTRACT(YZWB,2,99) . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,22)=YZWB ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . ; . . . SET YZWB=$PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,24) ; D24 $$$WWW120Modules() . . . FOR YZWB(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(MOD,";",YZWB(1))="" IF '$FIND(";"_YZWB_";",";"_$PIECE(MOD,";",YZWB(1))_";") SET YZWB=YZWB_";"_$PIECE(MOD,";",YZWB(1)) . . . IF $EXTRACT(YZWB)=";" SET YZWB=$EXTRACT(YZWB,2,99) . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,24)=YZWB ;BERECHTIGUNG MODULE . . . ; . . . SET YZWB=$PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,104) ; D104 $$$WWW120ReadOnlyAccessForModules() . . . FOR YZWB(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(MOD1,";",YZWB(1))="" IF '$FIND(";"_YZWB_";",";"_$PIECE(MOD1,";",YZWB(1))_";") SET YZWB=YZWB_";"_$PIECE(MOD1,";",YZWB(1)) . . . IF $EXTRACT(YZWB)=";" SET YZWB=$EXTRACT(YZWB,2,99) . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,104)=YZWB ;BERECHTIGUNG MODULE NUR LESEN ;only read . . . ; . . . ;SR17792 vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv . . . new idxForm . . . set idxForm = $$$Index(FORM) . . . set FORMB = "" . . . for set FORMB = $order(^WWW124s(0,3,idxForm,FORMB)) quit:FORMB="" do . . . . set LANG="" . . . . for set LANG = $order(^WWW124s(0,3,idxForm,FORMB,LANG)) quit:LANG="" do . . . . . set BUTT="" . . . . . for set BUTT = $order(^WWW124s(0,3,idxForm,FORMB,LANG,BUTT)) quit:BUTT="" do . . . . . . set $piece(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22) = BER ;BERECHTIGUNG ; D22 $$$WWW124Authorization1() . . . . . . set $piece(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23) = MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE ; D23 $$$WWW124Module1() . . . ;SR17792 ; BUTTON - other forms calling this form ; FIXME : see above - perhaps add index to D7 so find matching forms directly <GRF> . . . ;SR17792 SET FORMB="" . . . ;SR17792 FOR SET FORMB=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORMB)) QUIT:FORMB="" DO . . . ;SR17792 . SET LANG="" . . . ;SR17792 . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . . ;SR17792 . . SET BUTT="" . . . ;SR17792 . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . ;SR17792 . . . QUIT:$PIECE($GET(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT,1)),Y,7)'=FORM ;NICHT DIE GLEICHE FORM ;Not who same shape . . . ;SR17792 . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22)=BER ;BERECHTIGUNG ; D22 $$$WWW124Authorization1() . . . ;SR17792 . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORMB,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23)=MOD ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE ; D23 $$$WWW124Module1() . . . ;SR17792 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ . . . ; . . . ; BUTTONS on this form - menu entitlements applied to buttons . . . SET LANG="" . . . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . . . SET BUTT="" . . . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . . . SET BUTT1=$GET(^WWW00442(0,PGM,MENU,BUTT,1)) . . . . . QUIT:BUTT1="" . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,22) ;BERECHTIGUNG ; D22 $$$WWW124Authorization1() . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,23) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE ; D23 $$$WWW124Module1() . . . . . SET ^CacheTempButtonAccess(YUSER,FORM,LANG,BUTT)="" ;FIS;SR14630;04.08.2006 . . . ; . . . ; TABS - SEITENREITERBERECHTIGUNG;TYBD;16.07.2003;23940; . . . SET LANG="" . . . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . . . SET SEITT="" . . . . FOR SET SEITT=$ORDER(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,SEITT)) QUIT:SEITT="" DO . . . . . SET SEITT1=$GET(^WWW00444(0,PGM,MENU,SEITT,1)) . . . . . QUIT:SEITT1="" . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,SEITT,1),Y,6)=$PIECE(SEITT1,Y,22) ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,SEITT,1),Y,5)=$PIECE(SEITT1,Y,23) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
IF $DATA(^WWW120BUTTOND1(0)) DO ;FIS;SR14630;04.08.2006;SET ACCESS OUT OF CUSTOMIZING FILE . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWW120BUTTOND1(0,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . SET BUTT="" . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW120BUTTOND1(0,FORM,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . SET BUTT1=$GET(^WWW120BUTTOND1(0,FORM,BUTT,1)) . . . SET LANG="" . . . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . . . QUIT:$DATA(^CacheTempButtonAccess(YUSER,FORM,LANG,BUTT)) ; already updated // SR14630 . . . . IF $DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1)) DO . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,1) ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,2) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . . . IF $DATA(^WWW124D(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1)) DO . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,1) ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,2) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
KILL ^CacheTempButtonAccess(YUSER) ;FIS;SR14630;04.08.2006 QUIT
BERECHT ;EINSPRUNG AUSBUTTON /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Process to enable program entitlements ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 23-Jan-2006 Steve S SR13171: Commented -- use appropriate message ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ ;DO ^WWWVAR DO ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 . NEW YM,SPRACHE . DO ^WWWVAR ;VARIABLEN LADEN ;charge
IF $GET(YM)="" SET YM=0 ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 IF $GET(SPRACHE)="" SET SPRACHE="EN" ;BEC;26420;27.09.04 ;SR13171: Give an appropriate message DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(383)) ;Program Has Started In Background ;DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(30013)) JOB BERECHT1^WWWMON($GET(YM),$GET(SPRACHE))::1 QUIT
BERECHT1(YM,SPRACHE) DO ;TYBD;8,10,2004 . NEW YM,SPRACHE . DO ^WWWVAR ;VARIABLEN LADEN ;charge
DO BERECHTIGUNG QUIT
SAVE ;SPEICHERN DER DATEN ;Save the NEW PGM,MENU,MENUP,FORM,FORMB,BER,MOD,BUTT,LANG
DO ^WWWVAR KILL ^WWW0044(0) KILL ^WWW00441(0) KILL ^WWW00442(0) SET PGM="" FOR SET PGM=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM)) QUIT:PGM="" DO . QUIT:PGM="@net_Manager" . SET MENU=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,"")) . SET PGM(1)="" . IF MENU'="" SET PGM(1)=$GET(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1)) . QUIT:PGM(1)="" . SET BER=$PIECE(PGM(1),Y,3) . SET MOD=$PIECE(PGM(1),Y,4) . SET ^WWW0044(0,PGM,1)=Y_Y_BER_Y_MOD . SET MENU="" . FOR SET MENU=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU)) QUIT:MENU="" DO . . SET BER=$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,3) ;BERECHTIGUNG . . SET MOD=$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,4) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . . SET ^WWW00441(0,PGM,MENU,1)=Y_Y_BER_Y_MOD . . IF $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,2)'="" DO . . . SET MOD1=$PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,2),1)),Y,104) . . . IF MOD1'="" SET $PIECE(^WWW00441(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,104)=MOD1 . . SET FORM=$PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,2) . . IF FORM'="" DO . . . QUIT:$EXTRACT(FORM,1,3)="WWW" . . . SET LANG="DE" . . . DO ;FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . . . SET BUTT="" . . . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . . . SET BUTT1=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1)) . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW00442(0,PGM,MENU,BUTT,1),Y,22)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,22) ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW00442(0,PGM,MENU,BUTT,1),Y,23)=$PIECE(BUTT1,Y,23) ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
QUIT
LOESCH ;LÖSCHT DIE VORGABEN DER BERECHTIGUNG ;who the /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Blows away any existing program entitlements. ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 01-Oct-2007 GM SRBR014630: Quit for "VAR" routines ; 20-Jan-2006 Steve S SR13171: Commented -- clear custom buttons ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ NEW PGM,MENU,MENUP,FORM,FORMB,BER,MOD,BUTT,LANG
;++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; ; WWW120 : Form Class ; ; D22 : User Access ; D24 : Modules ; D104 : Read Only Access for Modules ; ;++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ if $get(Y)="" DO ^WWWVAR SET PGM="" FOR SET PGM=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM)) QUIT:PGM="" DO . QUIT:PGM="@net_Manager" . SET MENU="" . FOR SET MENU=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU)) QUIT:MENU="" DO . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,3)="" ;BERECHTIGUNG . . SET $PIECE(^WWW004(0,PGM,MENU,1),Y,4)="" ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
do ClearCustomButtons^WWW124Custom() ;SR13171
SET FORM="" FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWW120(0,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . QUIT:($EXTRACT(FORM,1,3)="VAR") ;BR014630 . QUIT:($EXTRACT(FORM,1,3)="WWW") . QUIT:('$DATA(^WWW120(0,FORM,1))) . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,22)="" ;BERECHTIGUNG . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,24)="" ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,FORM,1),Y,104)="" ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE NUR LESEN ;only read . ; . ;BUTTON . SET LANG="" . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . SET BUTT="" . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,22)="" ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW124(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,23)="" ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE . ; . ;SEITENREITERBERECHTIGUNG;TYBD;16.07.2003;23940; . SET LANG="" . FOR SET LANG=$ORDER(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG)) QUIT:LANG="" DO . . SET BUTT="" . . FOR SET BUTT=$ORDER(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT)) QUIT:BUTT="" DO . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,6)="" ;BERECHTIGUNG . . . SET $PIECE(^WWW1203(0,FORM,LANG,BUTT,1),Y,5)="" ;BERECHTIGUNGS MODULE
QUIT
